General.Name: Orient Green Power Company Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Orient Green Power Company Limited, an independent renewable energy company, develops, owns, and operates a portfolio of wind farms in India and Europe. The company has a portfolio of 402.3 MW of wind energy across Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat, and Karnataka, as well as 10.5 MW wind power plant in Croatia. Orient Green Power Company Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Chennai, India.

5.Name: Mr. N.  Ramkhumar
5.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Wind - Bharath Wind Farm Limited
